info.title: EAI-NM REST interface
info.description: API to access and handle the Number resources in EAI

get.summary: Get information about a specific Telephone Number
get.description: Get information about a specific Phone Number

200.description: Successful operation, returns a number object

400.description:
Bad request, returned error code and error message give more details.
* code 1, message "Mandatory parameter [parameter_name] not provided"
* code 2, message "Telephone number not found"

patch.description:
The method is designed for the use-cases;
* Update Number-owning CRM. Use the numberOwningCrm parameter. Only accepted in WK status.
* Set/modify/remove Reference Information. Use the referenceInformation parameter. Only accepted in WK status.
* Set/modify/remove disconnection information. Use the disconnectReasonCode and disconnectReferenceNumber parameter. Only accepted in WK or AG status.
* Modify Stop Dormancy Date. Use the stopDormancyDate parameter. Only accepted in AG status. New date must be today or later.

parameters.name: referenceInformation
parameters.description: Optional information used for example to tie the number to a customers primary number.

parameters.name: disconnectReasonCode
parameters.description: Disconnect reason (service being moved or disconnected and has calls forwarded to a spoken announcement).

parameters.name: disconnectReferenceNumber
parameters.description: If the number has latency information a refernce telephone number can be given for some latency codes and will be used in the spoken announcement. The telephone number shall be follow the legacy format with separator between area code and local number.

parameters.name: stopDormancyDate
parameters.description: Defines the date when a number will become released. Valid for numbers in Derived status Dormant.

200.description: Successful operation, returns a number object

400.description:
Bad request, returned error code and error message give more details.
* code 1, message "Mandatory parameter [parameter_name] not provided"
* code 2, message "Telephone number not found"
* code 20, message "Provided Number Owning CRM does not exist"
* code 21, message "Provided Disconnect Reason does not exist"
* code 22, message "Provided Stop Dormancy Date in wrong format"
* code 23, message "Action not allowed for number in this status"

get.summary: Get list of available telephone numbers
get.description: Get a requested amount of available numbers of a specified category and in a specifed region.

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: The region from which the available telephone numbers shall be selected.

parameters.name: serviceCategory
parameters.description: The service category of the requested telephone numbers.

parameters.name: amountOfNumbers
parameters.description: The requested amount of available numbers.

parameters.name: searchCriteria
parameters.description:
An optional criteria to filter the available numbers returned. For example:
* %00 => Only numbers ending with "00" is returned.
* 477% => Only numbers starting with "477" is returned.
* %22% => Only numbers containing "22" is returned.
* 477%00 => Only numbers starting with "477" and ending with "00" is returned.

200.description: Successful operation, returns a list of numbers available for booking (or reservation).

400.description:
Bad request, returned error code and error message give more details.
* code 1, message "Mandatory parameter [parameter_name] not provided"
* code 3, message "The Service Category does not exist"
* code 4, message "The Region does not exist"
* code 5, message "Amount of requested numbers exceeds allowed value"
* code 6, message "No available numbers matching the search criteria was found"

message.example: No available numbers matching the search criteria was found

patch.summary: Return list of received available telephone numbers
patch.description: Return the part of the list of received numbers that is not booked or reserved.

parameters.name: numbers
parameters.description: The list of available telephone numbers that shall be returned.

400.description:
Bad request, returned error code and error message give more details.
* TBD

post.description: Book a telephone number and register the number owning CRM.

parameters.name: referenceInformation
parameters.description: Optional information used for example to tie the number to a customers primary number.

200.description: Successful operation, returns the number object

400.description:
Bad request, returned error code and error message give more details.
* code 1, message "Mandatory parameter [parameter_name] not provided"
* code 2, message "Telephone number not found"
* code 7, message "Requested transition not allowed for current telephone number status"
* code 20, message "Provided Number Owning CRM does not exist"

message.example: Requested transition not allowed for current telephone number status

post.description: Cancel a previously booked telephone number.

200.description: Successful operation, returns the number object

400.description:
Bad request, returned error code and error message give more details.
* code 1, message "Mandatory parameter [parameter_name] not provided"
* code 2, message "Telephone number not found"
* code 7, message "Requested transition not allowed for current telephone number status"
* code 30, message "Telephone number locked, no status/attribute changes allowed"

message.example: Requested transition not allowed for current telephone number status

200.description: Successful operation, returns the number object

400.description:
Bad request, returned error code and error message give more details.
* code 1, message "Mandatory parameter [parameter_name] not provided"
* code 2, message "Telephone number ot found"
* code 7, message "Requested transition not allowed for current telephone number status"
* code 20, message "Provided Number Owning CRM does not exist"
* code 30, message "Telephone number locked, no status/attribute changes allowed"

message.example: Requested transition not allowed for current telephone number status

parameters.name: portingInformation
parameters.description: If the deactivation includes porting this attribute needs to be given.

200.description: Successful operation, returns the number object

400.description:
Bad request, returned error code and error message give more details.
* code 1, message "Mandatory parameter [parameter_name] not provided"
* code 2, message "Telephone number ot found"
* code 7, message "Requested transition not allowed for current telephone number status"
* code 24, message "Porting flag can only be Y or N"
* code 30, message "Telephone number locked, no status/attribute changes allowed"

message.example: Requested transition not allowed for current telephone number status

post.description: Reserve a telephone number during a specified time with an optional reservation text describing the reason for reservation. The reservation time may be extended and/or the reservation text updated buy a subsequent reservation request on an already reserved telephone number

parameters.name: reservedUntil
parameters.description: The reserved until date. The parameter is required for the initial reservation of a telephone number but optional for a subsequent call where only the reservationText is updated. The parameter can be used on an already reserved number to extend the reservation period.

parameters.name: reservationText
parameters.description: Optional free text describing the reason for reservation. The parameter can be used on an already reserved number to update the reservation text.

200.description: Successful operation, returns the number object

400.description:
Bad request, returned error code and error message give more details.
* code 1, message "Mandatory parameter [parameter_name] not provided"
* code 2, message "Telephone number not found"
* code 7, message "Requested transition not allowed for current telephone number status"
* code 8, message "Reservation date must be given in the request"
* code 9, message "Number can not be reserved as it is part of a number collection"
* code 10, message "Reserved Until Date invalid"

post.description: Release a ported Telia telephone number from aging or if no number can be found, create a new Non-Telia telephone number. The number will be reserved for 30 days with reservation text "Port-In".

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The telephone number Identifier in the form of area code - local number (0480-25312).

200.description: Successful operation, returns the number object

400.description:
Bad request, returned error code and error message give more details.
* code 1, message "Mandatory parameter [parameter_name] not provided"
* code 7, message "Requested transition not allowed for current telephone number status"

message.example: Requested Telephone number status update not allowed in current status

post.description: Lock a telephone number from status or attribute updates by other client systems.

parameters.name: lock
parameters.description: The requested lock status for the number. Can be "on" or "off".

parameters.name: lockingClientName
parameters.description: The client system locking the number.

200.description: Successful operation, returns the number object

400.description:
Bad request, returned error code and error message give more details.
* code 1, message "Mandatory parameter [parameter_name] not provided"           
* code 7, message "Requested transition not allowed for current telephone number status"

message.example: Requested Telephone number status update not allowed in current status

parameters.name: listId
parameters.description: The list id of the Number Collection.

200.description: Successful operation, returns the number collection object

400.description:
Bad request, returned error code and error message give more details.
* code 1, message "Mandatory parameter [parameter_name] not provided"           
* code 11, message "Number Collection not found"

X-Request-Id.description: Every request must contain UUID of the request, filled by caller and reported in the response. Used for logging purposes. This must be generated in any new request of the caller and never reused.

Date.description: The date and time that the message was sent. ISO 8601 format with time zone

date.name: Date
date.description: The date and time that the message was sent. On ISO 8601 format, including timezone

host.name: Host
host.description: The domain name of the server, and the TCP port number on which the server is listening. The port number may be omitted if the port is the standard port for the service requested.

origin.name: Origin
origin.description: It’s added by the user agent to describe the contexts that caused the user agent to initiate an HTTP request

sourceUser.name: Source-User
sourceUser.description: The user name (TCAD id) causing the request to be sent from the client system.

xRequestId.name: X-Request-Id
xRequestId.description: Every request must contain UUID of the request, filled by caller and reported in the response. Used for logging purposes. This must be generated in any new request of the caller and never reused.

xCorrelationId.name: X-Correlation-Id
xCorrelationId.description: Mandatory on for asynchronous messages, this is used across several call to refer to same asynchronous server order/work order. Will be passed on by EAI if the request trigger other API calls, and might have been passed on from another request. This should live as long as there are active processes triggered by calls.

id.name: id
id.description: The telephone number expressed in one out of two formats. Either the telephone number Identifier in the form of area code - local number (0480-25312) or the telephone number Name in the E.164 format (+4648025312)

orderInformation.name: orderInformation
orderInformation.description: The order number or other reason for booking the number. This information will be available in the number history for the number.

name.description: ISO E.164 format of the phone number.

identifier.description: Telephone number in legacy format with separator between area code and local number.

owningOperator.description: Shows if the number belongs to Telia or if it is an imported number. Values "Telia" or "Non-Telia"

serviceCategory.description: The Service Category for the number.

startDormancyDate.description: Defines the date when a number was set to Dormant. Valid for numbers in Derived status Dormant.

stopDormancyDate.description: Defines the date when a number will become released. Valid for numbers in Derived status Dormant.

reservedUntilDate.description: Defines the date when a number is removed from reservation. Valid for numbers in Derived status Reserve

reservationText.description: Defines the reason for the reservation

disconnectReason.description: Shows if the number has latency information (service being moved or disconnected and has calls forwarded to a spoken announcement).

disconnectReasonCode.description: Numerical representation of the disconnect reason. No disconnect reason is represented by null.

disconnectReferenceNumber.description: If the number has latency information a refernce telephone number can be given for some latency codes and will be used in the spoken announcement. The telephone number shall be follow the legacy format with separator between area code and local number.

referenceInformation.description: Can be used to tie a number to another number, the customers main number.

listId.description: The name of the number collection.

ncCategory.description: The category of the number collection.

primeNumber.description: The number collection primary number in legacy format with a separator between area code and local number.

listId.description: The name of the number collection.

primeNumber.description: The prime number related to the Number Collection

listOwner.description: The organisation Id of the company owning the Number Collection

listCustomer.description: The name of the company owning the Number Collection

customerOrderNumber.description: The order number related to the Number Collection

dueDate.description: The date when the number collection will be automatically removed.

identifier.description: Telephone number in legacy format with separator between area code and local number.

exceptionFlag.description: The exception flag of the number.

items.description: Telephone number in legacy format with separator between area code and local number.
